details: Donor Analyzer ingests and maps a custom Browser attribute, CRM ID, to each donor session allowing users to identify key donors whose experiences have been compromised by a poor user experience. Donor analyzer can even export a list of recent frustrated donor sessions into a .CSV file. That file can then be uploaded into any marketing system allowing your organization to rapidly communicate with or remarket to donors who have recently had a bad experience on your site.
whatsNew:
-Feat: Make use of nr1-community library
-Feat: make use of the entityGuid in queries
-Feat: Prep app for supporting SPA's
